pages.text: Maori is a fast and nimble scout ship with several onboard spyglasses. It is a trusted escort ship that has guided many ships to their destination, using its 6 cannons to fend off any unprepared attackers.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/spyglass)$(l)Spyglass/$$(br)Maori's crew looks carefully at $(l)a row of 5 tiles/$. If there are any ship parts in those tiles, then Maori will notify the entire fleet of the $(l)exact location of those ship parts/$. This ability has $(l)2 Uses/$ and costs $(l)6 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/seaworthy)$(l)Seaworthy/$$(br)The ships strong build provides an $(l)additional 7 tiles/$ to use for your fleet.
pages.title: Passive Ability
